definition: Zhan Tianyou (1861-1919), Chinese railroad engineer
excellent/verbose
surname Zhan
day/sky/heaven
to assist/to protect

sentences.english: Zhan Tianyou was born in 1861, in Nanhai County, Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 詹天佑1861年出生在广东省南海县。

sentences.english: What did you think of the film about Zhan Tianyou on television last night?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得昨天晚上电视上演关于詹天佑那部电影怎么样？

sentences.english: Zhan Tianyou the face of a serious face.
sentences.chinese: 面对着詹天佑严肃的面孔。

sentences.english: Zhan Tianyou began his life of railways in Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 詹天佑的铁路生涯是从天津开始的。

sentences.english: Railway father Zhan Tianyou showed ingenuity in building railways .
sentences.chinese: 铁路之父詹天佑独具匠心筑路与创造。
